code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/FilterForm.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FilterForm=_ref=>{let{onFilter}=_ref;const[startDate,setStartDate]=useState('');const[endDate,setEndDate]=useState('');const[minRevenue,setMinRevenue]=useState('');const[maxRevenue,setMaxRevenue]=useState('');const[minNetIncome,setMinNetIncome]=useState('');const[maxNetIncome,setMaxNetIncome]=useState('');const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onFilter({dateRange:[startDate,endDate],revenueRange:[parseFloat(minRevenue),parseFloat(maxRevenue)],netIncomeRange:[parseFloat(minNetIncome),parseFloat(maxNetIncome)]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Date Range:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:startDate,onChange:e=>setStartDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:endDate,onChange:e=>setEndDate(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Revenue Range:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:minRevenue,onChange:e=>setMinRevenue(e.target.value),placeholder:"Min Revenue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:maxRevenue,onChange:e=>setMaxRevenue(e.target.value),placeholder:"Max Revenue"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Net Income Range:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:minNetIncome,onChange:e=>setMinNetIncome(e.target.value),placeholder:"Min Net Income"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:maxNetIncome,onChange:e=>setMaxNetIncome(e.target.value),placeholder:"Max Net Income"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Apply Filters"})]});};export default FilterForm;
